name: Iceberg Iceland
description: In 2030, a small robot is sent to probe the state of the North Pole glaciers. However, during his mission, he finds himself in the middle of an ice floe, which is cracking piece by piece to sink into the depths of the frozen waters. He transmits the little information he has been able to obtain about the situation to his base, and waits for instructions: “Fractured ice floe - 10 seconds between each separated piece - need reinforcements.” Immediately, you, behind your screen, take in hand the manual control of the robot in order to ensure its survival while the rescue team comes to help it. Do your best!
